charges.charge_description: COUNT 1: 21 USC 846: CONSPIRACY; COUNT 2: 21 USC 841(a)(1) AND (b)(1)(B): DISTRIBUTION OF 100 GRAMS AND MORE OF HEROIN(1s)

21:846, 841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(A): Conspiracy to distribute more than 1 kilogram &; more of heroin (one count); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B): Distribution of 100 grams and more of heroin (two counts); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B): Distribution of 50 grams and more of a mixture containing Meth (one count); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(C): Distribution of heroin (four counts); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B): Possession with intent to distribute 50 grams and more of heroin (one count); 18:2 Aiding and Abetting.
Count 2: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C): DISTRIBUTION OF HEROIN; 18 USC 2 AIDING AND ABETTING(2s)

21:846, 841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(A): Conspiracy to distribute more than 1 kilogram &; more of heroin (one count); 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C): Possession with intent to distribute heroin (one count); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B): Distribution of 100 grams and more of heroin (two counts); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B): Distribution of 50 grams and more of a mixture containing Meth (one count); 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(C): Distribution of heroin (one count);  18:2 Aiding and Abetting.
